name: 余炳盛
schedule:
第1週：Introduction, the study of mineral as part of earth science, mineral science, definition of mineral, history of mineralogy, economic importance of minerals.
第2週：Physical properties of minerals (1): crystal form and crystal habit, intergrowth, twins, and striations, state of aggregation, luster, color, and streak.
第3週：Physical properties of minerals (2): play of color, chatoyancy and asterism, luminescence, fluorescence, cleavage, parting, fracture.
第4週：Physical properties of minerals (3): hardness, fracture, parting, tenacity, magnetism.
第5週：Physical properties of minerals (4): specific gravity, radioactive, solubility in HCl, piezoelectricity.
第6週：Chemical composition of minerals (1): Chemical composition of the Earth’s crust, the atom, the ion.
第7週：Chemical composition of minerals (2): variability of mineral compositions, Determination of a mineral formula.
第8週：Chemical composition of minerals (3): Graphical representation of mineral composition.
第9週：Mid-term exam.
第10週：Crystal growth (1) crystal growth, structural complexities and defects
第11週：Crystal growth (2) intergrowths of crystals,
第12週：Crystal growth (3) origin of color, origin of magnetic properties, mineraloid.
第13週：Mineral stability, and phase diagrams (1): stability, activation energy, and equilibrium, introductory thermodynamic.
第14週：Mineral stability, and phase diagrams (2) phase diagrams.
第15週： Mineral stability, and phase diagrams (3)  phase diagrams.
第16週：Post-crystallization processes in minerals :  polymorphic reactions, Secondary twining.
第17週：Post-crystallization processes in minerals :  exsolution, radioactivity and metamicization.
第18週：Final exam.
scorePolicy:
出缺席，學習態度等平時成績：15%
作業及小考：25%
期中考：30%
期末考：30%
